brief.brief: Use Secondary File Queries to gather information from another table in addition to your primary table for Service Manager to use in calculations or other field value operations.
The most common use for this function is to use information from your primary table to extract information from a secondary table, perform a calculation or a merge, and display the result.

For example, if you have a resolution code field in your primary table and you have a list of all resolution codes with their corresponding text description in another table, you could use Secondary File Queries to match the correct resolution code and then assign the text from the secondary table into a variable and display it on a form.
